1.title: Ready to Go
1.plot: Legendary boxer Peter Welch and the top trainers from rival gyms around Boston start a new promotion to revive boxing. They choose two of their best fighters for the first bout. After a week of intense training the fighters finally face off in the ring.

imdb.plot outline: Determined to revive boxing in Boston, gym owner and former fighter Peter Welch formulates a plan to revitalize the sport: each week, trainers from rival boxing gyms across Boston choose their top amateur fighters to represent their gyms in a bout. After seven days of intense training, the fighters will face off in the ring with their professional futures at stake.
imdb.title: The Fighters
plot: Determined to revive boxing in Boston, gym owner and former fighter Peter Welch formulates a plan to revitalize the sport: each week, trainers from rival boxing gyms across Boston choose their top amateur fighters to represent their gyms in a bout. After seven days of intense training, the fighters will face off in the ring with their professional futures at stake.
